```{r setup, include=FALSE}

packages <- c(
  "readr",
  "tidyverse",
  "tidyr",
  "sf",
  "leaflet", 
  "readxl", 
  "mapboxapi",
  "tmap",
  "tmaptools",
  "tidycensus",
  "tigris"
)
lapply(packages, library, character.only = TRUE)

## PATHS
wd <- getwd()

## PARAMETERS
wgs <- 4326
hill_country <- c("Comal", "Bexar", "Hays", "Travis", "Blanco", "Kendall")
```


## S/CENTRAL TX COUNTIES

```{r}
counties_sf <- counties(state = "Texas")

head(counties_sf)

```

```{r}
select_counties <- counties_sf %>% 
  filter(NAME %in% hill_country)

head(select_counties)
```

```{r}
aggregate_region_sf <- select_counties %>%
  group_by(STATEFP) %>% 
  summarize(counties = n()) %>% 
  ungroup()

```
